name: Chapter 8: First Major Challenge
short_description: Sarah faces opposition from traditionalists within the academy who view magi tech as a threat to the natural order of magic.
from_prev_chapter: Sarah works on more complex magi tech projects.
to_next_chapter: Sarah seeks allies and support within the academy.

beats.description: As Sarah's magi tech projects gain traction, murmurs of discontent start spreading among the traditionalist faculty members who view her innovations as a disruption to magical purity.

beats.long_title: Sarah Faces Her First Major Opponent
beats.description: During a presentation of her latest magi tech project, a senior faculty member publicly challenges Sarah's approach, causing an uproar among the students and staff present.

beats.long_title: Formal Debates on Magi Tech vs Traditional Magic
beats.description: The academy organizes a formal debate between Sarah and the traditionalists to discuss the merits and demerits of integrating technology with magic. Both sides present compelling arguments, drawing mixed reactions from the audience.
Sarah starts to question whether her efforts to blend technology with magic are worth the resistance she is facing. She battles self-doubt and contemplates whether to abandon her projects.
Amidst the opposition, Sarah finds support from an unexpected quarter – a group of progressive students and a few open-minded faculty members who believe in the potential of magi tech.

beats.long_title: Sarah and Her Allies Plan Their Next Move
beats.description: Realizing that the opposition is stronger than she anticipated, Sarah and her newfound allies brainstorm strategies to present a more united front and win over the skeptics.

beats.long_title: A Traditionalist Puts Magi Tech to the Test
beats.description: A prominent traditionalist challenges Sarah to demonstrate a practical application of her magi tech, promising to reconsider his opposition if she succeeds. This test becomes a make-or-break moment for Sarah.

Under the watchful eyes of the academy, Sarah demonstrates her magi tech in a high-pressure situation. The outcome of this demonstration could drastically alter the perception of magi tech within the academy.
After the demonstration, Sarah anxiously waits for the feedback from the traditionalists and other faculty members. She experiences moments of doubt and anxiety during this waiting period.

beats.long_title: Outcome of the Demonstration and Next Steps
beats.description: The chapter concludes with the academy's verdict on Sarah's magi tech. Based on the outcome, Sarah starts planning her next steps, setting the stage for seeking allies and support within the academy in the next chapter.
